segments.text: The girl looks so eager to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be really trusting her brother to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing her like this, hoping for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must really want that cookie to be cooperating in this risky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't get hurt if the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is so attentive and expectant, it's quite touching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should just ask her mother for a cookie instead of doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems like such a sweet girl, just waiting there patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me feel a bit emotional.
segments.speaker: PAR
